Do you love music ? Yes? _ boys and girls in No.5 Middle School love music,too. They _ in a village . They have to go to school by boat because there is a _ between their school and their homes . _ have dreams of being musicians  . But their dream are difficult to come true, _ they have no money to _ a piano, a guitar or a violin.
Do you want to help them ? If   you do,come and _ us . We will   have a great sale at Students' Home in our school . _ watches , clothes , schoolbags and many school things will be _ sale here .We'll help the _ in No.5 Middle School with the money .We _ buy pianos,guitars or violins for them, or give the money to them , and they can have music _ . These students must be very _ .
Our _ is from next Monday to Wednesday .We welcome all of you.
